title: Cosmic Skateboard
info: The Cosmic Skateboard is a pet-summoning item that has a 25*1/4 (25%) chance of dropping from the Martian Saucer in Master Mode. It summons an Alien Skater that will follow the player around.
stat:
Type
Pet summon
Use time20 (Very fast)
TooltipSummons an alien skater
'Kickflips are a lot easier in Zero-G!'
